AI_Greenhouse_agent.description: A visual series exploring the symbolic interconnection between artificial intelligence, ecological systems, and regenerative knowledge. Hybrid forms of life and code cohabit in futuristic greenhouses where nature is both cultivated and encoded.

AI_Agents.description: Iconic and minimal portraits of artificial agents â€” silent observers, digital infiltrators, and synthetic operatives. Each image represents a cryptic intelligence node within a fictional AI surveillance network.

AI&The_Cube.description: Digital altars, sentient cubes, and crystallized memory vaults. This series unfolds a speculative mythology of artificial intelligence contained within architectonic data structures. Time, code, and consciousness are compressed into symbolic containers.
